## SimStoreState type

Type of [SimStore](./lib-base.simstore.md)<!-- -->'s [state](./lib-base.simstore.state.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SimStoreState<T = unknown> = SimStoreBaseState & SimStoreDerivedState & T;
```
<b>References:</b> [SimStoreBaseState](./lib-base.simstorebasestate.md)<!-- -->, [SimStoreDerivedState](./lib-base.simstorederivedstate.md)

## Remarks

It combines all properties of [SimStoreBaseState](./lib-base.simstorebasestate.md) and [SimStoreDerivedState](./lib-base.simstorederivedstate.md) with optional extra state added by the particular `SimStore` implementation.

The type parameter `T` may be used to type the extra state.
